pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `pgb_broker_utils`- `pip install pgb_broker_utils`- `import broker_utils`Note that the schema maps are stored in a Cloud Storage bucket and are not packaged with this module.This has the following benefits:1. Schema maps can be updated easily by uploading new files to the bucket.2. Broker instances can use different schema maps; each instance loads them from their own `broker_files` bucket.
